document.full_text: the ontario teachers' pension plan (ottp), one of canada's largest, is shopping around its 66 percent stake in maple leaf sports and entertainment, the owner of the toronto maple leafs hockey team and the toronto raptors basketball team.
document.title: ontario teachers pension plan shops leafs, raptors
lines_and_colors: the ontario teachers' pension plan (ottp), one of canada's largest, is shopping around its 66 percent stake in maple leaf sports and entertainment, the owner of the toronto maple leafs hockey team and the toronto raptors basketball team.
